sql_query: SELECT ac.agenda_code, ac.subject, ac.sent_time, ac.decision_status, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN arc.ABS IS NOT NULL OR arc.BV IS NOT NULL OR arc.CCS IS NOT NULL OR arc.CRS IS NOT NULL OR arc.DNV IS NOT NULL OR arc.IRS IS NOT NULL OR arc.KR IS NOT NULL OR arc.NK IS NOT NULL OR arc.PRS IS NOT NULL OR arc.RINA IS NOT NULL OR arc.LR IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as response_count FROM agenda_chair ac LEFT JOIN agenda_responses_content arc ON ac.agenda_base_version = arc.agenda_base_version WHERE ac.sent_time >= datetime('now', '-30 days') GROUP BY ac.agenda_code, ac.subject, ac.sent_time, ac.decision_status ORDER BY ac.sent_time DESC LIMIT 20
sql_query_with_parameters: SELECT ac.agenda_code, ac.subject, ac.sent_time, ac.decision_status, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN arc.ABS IS NOT NULL OR arc.BV IS NOT NULL OR arc.CCS IS NOT NULL OR arc.CRS IS NOT NULL OR arc.DNV IS NOT NULL OR arc.IRS IS NOT NULL OR arc.KR IS NOT NULL OR arc.NK IS NOT NULL OR arc.PRS IS NOT NULL OR arc.RINA IS NOT NULL OR arc.LR IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as response_count FROM agenda_chair ac LEFT JOIN agenda_responses_content arc ON ac.agenda_base_version = arc.agenda_base_version WHERE ac.sent_time >= datetime('now', '-{days} days') GROUP BY ac.agenda_code, ac.subject, ac.sent_time, ac.decision_status ORDER BY ac.sent_time DESC LIMIT {limit}

sql_query: SELECT ac.*, arc.* FROM agenda_chair ac LEFT JOIN agenda_responses_content arc ON ac.agenda_base_version = arc.agenda_base_version WHERE ac.agenda_code = 'PL25016a'
sql_query_with_parameters: SELECT ac.*, arc.* FROM agenda_chair ac LEFT JOIN agenda_responses_content arc ON ac.agenda_base_version = arc.agenda_base_version WHERE ac.agenda_code = '{agenda_code}'

sql_query: SELECT arc.agenda_base_version, arc.response_org, arc.response_version, CASE WHEN arc.KR IS NOT NULL THEN 'Responded' ELSE 'No Response' END as kr_status FROM agenda_responses_content arc WHERE arc.response_org = 'KR'
sql_query_with_parameters: SELECT arc.agenda_base_version, arc.response_org, arc.response_version, CASE WHEN arc.{organization} IS NOT NULL THEN 'Responded' ELSE 'No Response' END as response_status FROM agenda_responses_content arc WHERE arc.response_org = '{organization}'

sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ac.agenda_code) as total_agendas, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN arc.agenda_base_version IS NOT NULL THEN ac.agenda_code END) as agendas_with_responses, ROUND(CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN arc.agenda_base_version IS NOT NULL THEN ac.agenda_code END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT ac.agenda_code) * 100, 2) as response_rate_percentage FROM agenda_chair ac LEFT JOIN agenda_responses_content arc ON ac.agenda_base_version = arc.agenda_base_version
SELECT ac.agenda_code, ac.subject, ac.sent_time, ac.decision_status FROM agenda_chair ac WHERE ac.decision_status != 'decision' ORDER BY ac.sent_time DESC
